item.description:
Don't forget to register for the North Haven PTSA 5K coming up this April Fool's day! This should be a fun chance for us to run a race together and jump start the running season. The race starts at 10:00 AM, so come early if possible and find us and help recruit some runners to our club!

The flyer is here and there is a link to the registration form which you can print out and mail in.

http://www.north-have...

Location:

Starting from the North Haven Middle School
55 Bailey Road

Parking at North Have High School
221 Elm Street

Note: there's no $2 meetup fee this time.
item.name: North Haven 5K Road race
